title.value: Pharmacological principles of therapy and prophylaxis of fasciolosis and other trematode infections in cattle and sheep
Фармакологические основы терапии и профилактики фасциолеза и других трематодозов крупного рогатого скота и овец

journal.title: Animal Agriculture and Veterinary Medicine : quaterly research and practice journal

person.name: Yatusevich, I.A., Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine (Belarus)

abstract.value: The paper presents data on the spread of trematode in cattle and small ruminants in the Republic of Belarus for a long-term period. The characteristic of anthelmintics administered to control fasciolosis and other trematode infections is given. Their essential fault connected with high toxicity and long restriction on use of meat and dairy products is stated in the article. We suggest new approaches to fasciolosis control through the use of boluses with albendazole and intradermal injections of clozantel-based preparation, which will allow us to provide effective economic therapy, take disease preventive measures, and avoid losses of cattle-breeding production due to dropping of restrictions on its use
